2012740.name: Lonely Darkness
2012740.description:
Project Y is a rogue-like game where at every level you pick a new upgrade and try to break the game with crazy builds.
Create your build to take out a thousand zombies to make the biggest score possible.



You start clean every playthrough but every level up you choose from cards to make a powerful build.



Slay thousands and thousands of endlessly encroaching zombies to stay alive! Collect crystals to level up and increase your power and abilities both in the field and in the permanent upgrade system.

Cards vary from a shield, upgraded projectiles to falling meteors to have the maximum DPS possible.
But be careful, when you get to level up, zombies get harder to kill.
Every game will vary, sometimes you have a crazy build, that insta-kills everything on map. But sometimes it will be really hard to even survive, it all depends on your build and your upgrades.

Some features of the game are:

- 20+ Different cards to choose from (more coming soon)

- 5 Elements to choose from

- Big world

- Hundreds of zombies on the map

- Multiple staves with a different playstyle

- Special zombies

- Upgrades to carry to a new run
2012740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
